name: Child Health and Disability Prevention (CHDP)
short_desc: Information and referral for low-income individuals and their children. Case management, preventive health check-ups
description: Provides information and referral services to low-income families with children, age 0-18, and Medi-Cal eligible children, age 0-20. Refers to complete preventive health care for kindergarten and first grade health check-ups and immunizations, including well-child health exams and follow-up care. Maintains directory of CHDP physicians and dentists that accept Medi-Cal.
